Vulois

Vulois breathed a sigh of relief. The enemy was vanquished for now, 
but at the expense of a great warrior. He picked Child's body up and 
turned to Windrazor.

"An enemy greater than anything we have imagined has come. We 
defeated him barely, and we needed the death of Eagle Eye to do it. 
I'm sorry Windrazor. He gave himself up freely for the mission. But 
the enemy is not dead, and we must be ready. Child is our only hope. 
I mus train him, make him learn how to control his power. If he 
doesn't learn, than Eagle Eye's death was in vain. Come, pick up his 
body. We will give him a great buriel in these halls!"

Vulois walked back up into the base.
